posts.title: Caffeinated Toothpaste
posts.content: Make mornings more productive by getting a jolt of energy from this caffeinated toothpaste. With each brush equivalent to one cup of coffee, this plaque fighting toothpaste helps increase your focus and alertness without causing a crash.

posts.title: Giant Inflatable Unicorn
posts.content: Turn any day out on the water into a magical experience by spending it atop this giant inflatable unicorn. At eight feel long, it provides ample room for laying out and is built with a special valve that allows for easy inflation.

posts.title: Wrap Around Extension Cord
posts.content: Avoid having to climb down to unplug tools by keeping the wrap around extension cord at your side. The functional design features a flexible gooseneck that allows you to wrap and bend it around just about anything so it’s always handy.

posts.title: Learning Thermostat
posts.content: The learning thermostat brings us a step closer to the home of the future – and the possible uprising of Skynet. The thermostat remembers your preferred temperature settings when you are home and powers down the A/C when you aren’t aren’t – so you save money.

posts.title: The Furniture Bible
posts.content: Breathe new life into vintage furniture by following the helpful tips inside “The Furniture Bible” book. This informative read comes packed with everything you need to know about furniture restoration so you can make old furniture look like it’s brand spanking new.

posts.title: Golden Girls Trivial Pursuit
posts.content: Put your Golden Girls knowledge to the ultimate test by playing Golden Girls Trivial Pursuit! The game comes with 600 questions that are based over the show’s seven seasons and broken into categories like “the ladies”, “who said it”, and “men of the night”.

posts.title: Portable Manual Coffee Maker
posts.content: Enjoy a home-brewed quality cup of Joe while you’re on the go using this portable manual coffee maker. It features a slim design that’s easy to transport and requires only a few pumps from your hand to brew exceptionally good tasting espresso.

posts.title: Washable Keyboard
posts.content: Crusty and soda stained keyboards are now a thing of the past thanks to the washable keyboard from Logitech. This water proof and washable keyboard features a durable design that is perfect for those messy computer sessions.

posts.title: 40-In-1 Multi-Tool Money Clip
posts.content: Handle any task with ease using this stainless steel 40-in-1 multi-tool money clip. Besides keeping your cash organized, it features a slew of tools ranging from a bottle opener to a cord cutter, so you’ll always have the right tool for the job.

posts.title: Rock ‘Em Sock ‘Em Superheroes
posts.content: The Justice League’s top dogs are going head to head like never before with these Rock ‘Em Sock ‘Em superheroes. Once they’re in position, you can pummel your opponent until their head gets knocked off their block.

posts.title: Unicorn Head Squirrel Feeder
posts.content: Have a laugh while you do your part to help your surrounding ecosystem by hanging up this unicorn head squirrel feeder. The head measures  9.5 x 10 inches and creates the illusion the squirrel has a comically sized unicorn head.

posts.title: Flip On/Off Alarm Clock
posts.content: Don’t overcomplicate your morning routine, all you need to get your day going is this simplistic design of the flip on/off alarm clock. This vibrant little battery operated clock is ultra compact which makes it ideal for traveling and can be switched on and off with a simple flip.
